nodes.bodyText: shall we validate whether corsOriginId exists in the beginning and return 404 if not?
This is validated at the osgi service.
shall we define an enum for this?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,232 @@
+openapi: 3.0.0
+info:
+  version: "1.0.0"
+  title: 'WSO2 Identity Server - CORS API Definition'
+  description: 'This document specifies a **RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server CORS**'
+  contact:
+    name: WSO2
+    url: 'http://wso2.com/products/identity-server/'
+    email: architecture@wso2.org
+  license:
+    name: Apache 2.0
+    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
+security:
+  - OAuth2: []
+  - BasicAuth: []
+paths:
+  /cors/origins:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - CORS origins
+      summary: Retrieve the tenant CORS origins.
+      operationId: getCORSOrigins
+      description: Retrieve the tenant CORS origins.
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginsGetResponse'
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+    patch:
+      tags:
+        - CORS origins
+      summary: Patch the tenant CORS origins.
+      operationId: patchCORSOrigins
+      description: A JSONPatch as defined by RFC 6902.
+      requestBody:
+        content:
+          application/json:
+            schema:
+              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginPatchRequest'
+        required: true
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+  /cors/origins/{cors-origin-id}/apps:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - App associations
+      summary: Retrieve the Applications associated with a CORS origin by ID.
+      operationId: getAssociatedAppsByCORSOrigin
+      description: Retrieve the Applications associated with a CORS origin by ID.
+      parameters:
+        - name: cors-origin-id
+          in: path
+          description: ID of a CORS origin
+          required: true
+          schema:
+            type: string
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginAppsGetResponse'
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+servers:
+  - url: 'https://localhost:9443/t/{tenant-domain}/api/server/v1'
+    variables:
+      tenant-domain:
+        default: carbon.super
+components:
+  securitySchemes:
+    BasicAuth:
+      type: http
+      scheme: basic
+    OAuth2:
+      type: oauth2
+      flows:
+        authorizationCode:
+          authorizationUrl: 'https://localhost:9443/oauth2/authorize'
+          tokenUrl: 'https://localhost:9443/oauth2/token'
+          scopes: {}
+  parameters:
+    typeQueryParam:
+      in: query
+      name: type
+      required: false
+      description: |
+        Type of authenticators. Can be either 'LOCAL' or 'REQUEST_PATH'

nodes.bodyText: This part was not introduced through this PR.

@@ -0,0 +1,232 @@
+openapi: 3.0.0
+info:
+  version: "1.0.0"
+  title: 'WSO2 Identity Server - CORS API Definition'
+  description: 'This document specifies a **RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server CORS**'
+  contact:
+    name: WSO2
+    url: 'http://wso2.com/products/identity-server/'
+    email: architecture@wso2.org
+  license:
+    name: Apache 2.0
+    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
+security:
+  - OAuth2: []
+  - BasicAuth: []
+paths:
+  /cors/origins:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - CORS origins
+      summary: Retrieve the tenant CORS origins.
+      operationId: getCORSOrigins
+      description: Retrieve the tenant CORS origins.
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginsGetResponse'
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+    patch:
+      tags:
+        - CORS origins
+      summary: Patch the tenant CORS origins.
+      operationId: patchCORSOrigins
+      description: A JSONPatch as defined by RFC 6902.
+      requestBody:
+        content:
+          application/json:
+            schema:
+              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginPatchRequest'
+        required: true
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+  /cors/origins/{cors-origin-id}/apps:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - App associations
+      summary: Retrieve the Applications associated with a CORS origin by ID.
+      operationId: getAssociatedAppsByCORSOrigin
+      description: Retrieve the Applications associated with a CORS origin by ID.
+      parameters:
+        - name: cors-origin-id
+          in: path
+          description: ID of a CORS origin
+          required: true
+          schema:
+            type: string
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginAppsGetResponse'
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+servers:
+  - url: 'https://localhost:9443/t/{tenant-domain}/api/server/v1'
+    variables:
+      tenant-domain:
+        default: carbon.super
+components:
+  securitySchemes:
+    BasicAuth:
+      type: http
+      scheme: basic
+    OAuth2:
+      type: oauth2
+      flows:
+        authorizationCode:
+          authorizationUrl: 'https://localhost:9443/oauth2/authorize'
+          tokenUrl: 'https://localhost:9443/oauth2/token'
+          scopes: {}
+  parameters:
+    typeQueryParam:
+      in: query
+      name: type
+      required: false
+      description: |
+        Type of authenticators. Can be either 'LOCAL' or 'REQUEST_PATH'

nodes.bodyText: shall we rename this to CORSOrigin?

+openapi: 3.0.0
+info:
+  version: "1.0.0"
+  title: 'WSO2 Identity Server - CORS API Definition'
+  description: 'This document specifies a **RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server CORS**'
+  contact:
+    name: WSO2
+    url: 'http://wso2.com/products/identity-server/'
+    email: architecture@wso2.org
+  license:
+    name: Apache 2.0
+    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
+security:
+  - OAuth2: []
+  - BasicAuth: []
+paths:
+  /cors/origins:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - CORS origins
+      summary: Retrieve the tenant CORS origins.
+      operationId: getCORSOrigins
+      description: Retrieve the tenant CORS origins.
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginsGetResponse'
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+    patch:
+      tags:
+        - CORS origins
+      summary: Patch the tenant CORS origins.
+      operationId: patchCORSOrigins
+      description: A JSONPatch as defined by RFC 6902.
+      requestBody:
+        content:
+          application/json:
+            schema:
+              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginPatchRequest'
+        required: true
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+  /cors/origins/{cors-origin-id}/apps:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - App associations
+      summary: Retrieve the Applications associated with a CORS origin by ID.
+      operationId: getAssociatedAppsByCORSOrigin
+      description: Retrieve the Applications associated with a CORS origin by ID.
+      parameters:
+        - name: cors-origin-id
+          in: path
+          description: ID of a CORS origin
+          required: true
+          schema:
+            type: string
+      responses:
+        '200':
+          description: Successful Response
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginAppsGetResponse'
+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden
+        '404':
+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+servers:
+  - url: 'https://localhost:9443/t/{tenant-domain}/api/server/v1'
+    variables:
+      tenant-domain:
+        default: carbon.super
+components:
+  securitySchemes:
+    BasicAuth:
+      type: http
+      scheme: basic
+    OAuth2:
+      type: oauth2
+      flows:
+        authorizationCode:
+          authorizationUrl: 'https://localhost:9443/oauth2/authorize'
+          tokenUrl: 'https://localhost:9443/oauth2/token'
+          scopes: {}
+  parameters:
+    typeQueryParam:
+      in: query
+      name: type
+      required: false
+      description: |
+        Type of authenticators. Can be either 'LOCAL' or 'REQUEST_PATH'
+      schema:
+        type: string
+  schemas:
+    Error:
+      type: object
+      properties:
+        code:
+          type: string
+          example: AAA-00000
+        message:
+          type: string
+          example: Some Error Message
+        description:
+          type: string
+          example: Some Error Description
+        traceId:
+          type: string
+          example: e0fbcfeb-3617-43c4-8dd0-7b7d38e13047
+    CORSOriginsGetResponse:
+      type: array
+      items:
+        $ref: '#/components/schemas/CORSOriginGetObject'
+    CORSOriginGetObject:

+          content:

+        - name: cors-origin-id

+          description: ID of a CORS origin

+        '400':
+          description: Bad Request
+          content:

+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '401':
+          description: Unauthorized
+        '403':
+          description: Forbidden

+          description: Not Found
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+        '500':
+          description: Server Error
+          content:
+            application/json:
+              schema:
+                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
+servers:
+  - url: 'https://localhost:9443/t/{tenant-domain}/api/server/v1'
+    variables:
+      tenant-domain:
+        default: carbon.super
+components:

+        authorizationCode:

@emswbandara Currently, this is named CORSOriginObject due to the recent changes in the API? WDYT?
Any suggestions for names?

Make sure to update the pom versions to the latest before merging.
